directions.step: Sift flour, baking powder, sugar & salt together.
Beat egg in cup and add beaten egg and 11/2 cups whole milk to make a batter. Stir well.
Add melted shortening and beat until light and thoroughly mixed.
Pour into greased shallow pan or greased muffin rings.
Bake in hot oven at 425 F for 25 minutes.
Cut into squares if cooked in shallow pan.

recipe.story: This food is well prepared by cooks in chennai, Many persons used to like this in Chennai , Tamil Nadu .
